column1: "description": "This table contains data related to Administration of Mineral Conservation and Development Rules from 2009-10 to 2013-14."
"file_name": "Administration_of_Mines.xls"
"title": "Download XLS for Administration Of Mineral Conservation And Development Rules
"url": "http://data.gov.in/sites/default/files/Administration_of_Mines.xls"
Year
Yeary Target of inspections
Number of mines inspected
Number of mines where violations observed
Number of rules & subrules for which violations pointed out
Number of mines where pointed out violations rectified
Number of rules & subrules rectified after pointing of violations
Number of mines to whom show cause notices issued for violations of MCDR (i.e. cases where rectification not done after observation)
Number of mines where rectification done after issue of show cause notices
Number of rules & subrules rectified after issue of show cause notice
Number of mines where prosecution cases launched
Number of mines where prosecution cases compounded by courts  ( cases compounded by IBM)
Compounded fee recovered- Rs.
Prosecution launched by IBM were upheld by the court
Fine recovered - Rs.
Number of mines where operations suspended -    under rule 13(2)
Number of mines where operations suspended -    under rule 45(7)
Number of mines where suuspension revoked   -Rule 13(2)
Number of mines where suuspension revoked   -Rule 45(7)
Number of mines recommended to the State Govt for termination under rule 27(1)(u) and 27(5) of MCR-1960
